subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goalie Rick DiPietro has never lived up to being a No. 1 draft pick in the N.H.L. or the huge contract he signed with the Islanders. Now he is back in the minors.
snippet: Goalie Rick DiPietro has never lived up to being a No. 1 draft pick in the N.H.L. or the huge contract he signed with the Islanders. Now he is back in the minors.
